name: Arcade soap series - street fighter 01
description: during adolescence most people prefer to have fun than to take care of themselves, this is a product that could have been a huge success in the 90s if it really existed, a game themed soap to encourage children to bathe (the artist has no right to the street fighter brand, and the work is only an artistic interpretation considering the games the author played in his youth, when he even jumped over the school wall to play).
